intro: The year 2021 saw a renewed wave of Palestinian resistance and solidarity, often referred to as the Unity Intifada. This period was marked by widespread protests against Israeli policies, particularly in Jerusalem, and a significant escalation of violence in Gaza.

events.title: Sheikh Jarrah Protests
events.text: Protests erupted in the East Jerusalem neighborhood of Sheikh Jarrah against the forced displacement of Palestinian families by Israeli settlers. These protests quickly spread and ignited wider demonstrations across Palestine.

sources.title: What is happening in Jerusalem's Sheikh Jarrah?

events.title: Gaza Escalation
events.text: Following Israeli raids on Al-Aqsa Mosque and protests in Jerusalem, Hamas launched rockets from Gaza, leading to an 11-day Israeli military offensive. Over 250 Palestinians were killed in Gaza, including many civilians.

sources.title: Gaza-Israel conflict: What happened in May 2021?

events.title: Ceasefire in Gaza
events.text: An Egyptian-brokered ceasefire came into effect, ending the 11-day conflict between Israel and Hamas in Gaza.

sources.title: Israel and Hamas agree Gaza ceasefire
